headerTop: COLLECT POINTS OF THE DAILY AND THE FINAL RAFFLES,
headerBottom: WIN A SHARE FROM 250 000₾ AND AN FLAT IN BATUMI!
registerText: PASS THE VERIFICATION AND GET 100 TICKETS FOR THE DAILY RAFFLE!
watchLive: WATCH THE LIVE RAFFLE HERE AND
getSpins: DURING THE RAFFLE, CLICK ON THE "GET FREEPINS" BUTTON AND GET THE SAME NUMBER OF EGT FREESPINS AS MANY TICKETS YOU HAVE COLLECTED!
forTicket: *TO GET A TICKET FILL THE PROGRESS UP TO 1 000₾
forTicket2: *TO GET A TICKET FILL THE PROGRESS UP TO 5 000₾
schedule: THE RAFFLE WILL BE HELD ON
schedule2: AT 21:55, ON THE OFFICIAL PAGE OF CROCOBET
bonus1: If you have collected 300 tickets in the current day’s raffle and you click on the button "get freespins" during the raffle, you will be credited 300 EGT freespins;
bonus2: During a day you can get min. 10 and max. 500 EGT freespins;
bonus3: Freespins will be credited to you within 1 hour;
bonus4: In the daily raffle, you will be credited freespins of 0.15₾ in ZODIAC WHEEL;
bonus5: In the final raffle, you will be credited freespins of 0.5₾ in ZODIAC WHEEL;
bonus6: * Freespins will be credited to the first 2 000 users who will click on the "Get freespins" button.
prize5: *FREESPINS WILL BE CREDITED IN THE SLOT OF ZODIAC WHEEL
toContinue: TO TAKE PART IN THE PROMOTION, PLEASE REGISTER OR GET LOG IN
min10: TO GET EGT FREESPINS YOU NEED TO COLLECT MIN. 10 TICKETS
alreadyTaken: YOU HAVE ALREADY RECEIVED THE PRIZE OF THE CURRENT DAY!
alreadyTaken2: WATCH THE LIVE RAFFLE TOMORROW AT 21:55 AND WIN EGT FREESPINS
first2000: THE FIRST 2 000 USERS CAN GET EGT FREESPINS.
